WorkItem.Description:
ProtWarr Module is not considering a special effect bounsArmor. For example trinket "the black heart" (http://www.wowhead.com/item=47216), considered only +125 stamine into total value of trinket. Proc effect not displayed even in hints (look at upload file).
P.S. Sorry for me english.
WorkItem.Summary: At ProtWarr Model not considered a temporary increase of the armor activated by impact

Comments.Message: I realize that english may not be everyone's first language, but you'll have to at least try harder than that.

What Astrylian means is that the language is broken enough to the point that it's difficult to understand the issue you're reporting.  My closest guess is that you're concerned that the ProtWarrior module is not accurately counting the proc effect into the total value of the trinket.  Is that an accurate interpretation?

Sorry for me english )
BrWarner is right.

I used 2.3.23 with default data files.

If your specific local copy isn't handling the proc effect for The Black Heart, refresh the item. If it still doesn't work, redownload Rawr as it is in the default data files.



** Closed by Jothay 26.09.2010 12:08
I used 2.3.23 with default data files.
